span.strong: Providing Progressive Education to Strengthen the Global Community

br.em:
It is policy that the South Eastern School District will not discriminate on the basis of race, color, age, creed, religion, gender, sexual orientation, ancestry, marital status, pregnancy, national origin or handicap/disability in its educational programs, activities or employment policies as required by Title IX of the Educational Amendments of 1972 and Section 405 of the Rehabilitational Act of 1973. The school district provides for handicapped persons. All written materials are available in an alternate format upon request.
Compliance issues/questions should be directed to the Superintendent
